message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a significant asset to you. We are offering this remarkable item for $950000. We are confident this price reflects the true worth of the product while also providing you with an opportunity to secure such a valuable item at a competitive rate.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value and quality of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $950000. I am willing to pay up to $850000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While I understand your financial considerations, I must respectfully decline your offer of $850000. Our product's value is quite high due to its unique features and benefits. I propose we reconsider the price at $900000. This still offers a substantial discount to its true worth, while ensuring we can maintain our business's profitability. I look forward to your thoughts on this proposal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still unable to meet the price of $900000. I am willing to pay up to $875000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. I am willing to consider a price of $887500 for the product. This figure represents a fair compromise between the true value of the product and your budgetary constraints. I hope this proposal will lead to a successful transaction.
